about_the_game:
This is a unique single player turn-based strategy game.
Each turn roll dices, then increase your stats based on the dice you cast, and then move around the map. You need to knock down enemies to save the village, you can build buildings on the map to help you complete the task.

Background of the story:
The world is devastated by unknown cataclysm, from which you, the Apocalypse, need to save the last remaining lives. As the game progresses, you will gradually discover the truth.
